posts.post_title: Wanted to Buy: Old Judge card(s) of Jim McCormick
posts.post_content:
Posted By: chris bland
Looking for any Old Judge card of Jim McCormick, particularly the portrait pose. Condition unimportant as long as the image is fairly strong. 

Please email me at crb_972@yahoo.com if you have any available for sale or trade. 

Thanks

Chris
